name: Reno A
text: I really like the concept. You get to choose what you like kinda like subway. Theres even keto options! My only complaint was the wait time but otherwise a great place to take the family

name: Frank Nelson
text: I've heard of this trendy place for a while, and I was looking forward to trying it. The concept was awesome, kind of a build your own pizza bar. I was disappointed in a few things... first off what's stopping you from having a wood fired ‚Ä¶More

text: The pizza was good but after biting into a pretty sizeable bone in my chicken I figured I would mention it to one of the staff who mentioned it to the manager. He came over and basically told me there was nothing they could do. I wasn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Moore
text: Pizza was great. But the cooks need to watch the oven more closely, my friends pizza was a little too well cooked(burnt).

name: MIMI GARTRELL
text: Create your own pizza is right up my alley. I don‚Äôt eat cheese and they offer a vegan cheese plus a gluten free crust. You get your pizza in a box so you can take home what is left over. There is an excellent amount of toppings to choose from. You can create your own pizza masterpiece.

name: Robert
text:
Only reason I gave two stars is because eating in restaurant is a good experience.

name: Brad Duncan
text: Really tasty pizza made right before your eyes (subway style). Try the blood orange lemonade, so good!

name: Charity Monroe
text:
The staff is always awesome and nice. Never had bad service.
Great food.

name: Anon Guy
text: Kind of a toss-up between this and Mod Pizza for best build-your-own individual pizza. Both are excellent. This location seems pretty busy, but staff is excellent and helpful. Pizza is terrific too. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Eaton
text: I've always had good pizza here, there was an error with the order and the manager was very apologetic and fixed it on the spot. Everyone makes mistakes. How a business handles that mistakes speaks volumes. This was on a Monday night if ‚Ä¶More

name: Sebastian Martinez
text: Place was real good, all the employees were nice and the place was clean

name: Therese Williams
text: I placed an order and pay online (including tip) for delivery.  It came sooner than expected, which was a nice surprise.  The driver rang my doorbell, and left the food on the front step in order to follow the social distancing rules.  The only interaction was a friendly wave and a thank you. Quick, easy, and safe.

name: Don Lininger
text: First time customer for Blaze. Dining area was clean, staff was friendly,  pizza crust was great, pizza toppings mediocre. Hence the four star. I was not impressed with the meat lovers pizza as the meat toppings were cheap, as in poor ‚Ä¶More

name: Becky Kendall
text: I ordered in a hurry online and accidentally ordered at the wrong location. The manager was super helpful, made my order where I was so I could be on my way. Super grateful for the help to fix my mistake. Yummy pizza too!

name: Andrew Fresh
text: Great service and a great pizza! There was a problem with my pizza and the employee noticed and remade the pizza!

name: Dominique Swanson
text: Came for the first time last night (a Monday night) and absolutely loved it! I was warmly greeted and helped by Alex. He explained how ordering works and gave great recommendations. I opted to do a build your own. They have a great ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad Carpenter
text: I'm a social fired-pizza eater. I don't go there of my own volition - I go when I'm outvoted by others in the office. That said, this is the better offering of other similar choices. I've had a Meat Eater and a custom Hawaiian (go ahead and judge) and both were good. And the water is carbonated, which is cool.

name: Shannon
text: They are rude and food is always gross, cold and soggy. Will not be spending my money here ever again.

name: lady romero
text: Absolutely love this place. I ordered the hot link (signature pizza) it was absolutely delicious. I also ordered the BYO salad that you can customize. This place is so great you can basically customize at NO ADDITIONAL COST anything on ‚Ä¶More

name: Sucias Are My Favorite
text: Savory pizza, personal sized and delicious, will definitely be coming back. This place has a sandwich shop "make it it in front of you"  approach and novel. Avoid lunch/dinner times to not have to wait as long as the pizza oven is only large enough for about 8‚Äî10 pies at a time

name: gman82378
text: Great flavors and options, good prices.

name: Bion Towne
text: I'm not sure how they do it but you order your pizza while at one end of the line, and by the time you get to the end of the line your brick oven pizza is done and waiting for you to pick up YMMV but that's been my experience both times ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberley Hellmers
text: Clean, friendly place with pretty good pie. Will definitely come back!

name: Devon McPartlin
text: This place is basically a subway of pizza places. It's pretty good thin pizza for a pretty good price.

name: Linda Chaffee - Gogarn
text: You can pick your dough, sauce, meats, and veggies. There is quite a selection to choose from; not to forget cheeses too. The price is good for the pizza - $8 bucks or so; but the drinks are a little pricey. All in all, a good deal, with take-out boxes too. They are also fast.

name: Paulette Savage
text: Love Blaze Pizza. Several different  pizza crusts including gluten free and cauliflower crusts. All the toppings you want or sauces at no extra cost. It is all fire roasted and quick. We've been there twice now and added salad. All delicious thus far. It is a pleasant findüòä

name: Monica Dawson
text: Expensive and ok.  $70.00 for 2 pizzas and wings that were just like little Caesars pizza/.....disappointed.

name: Tommy Fetter
text: Not happy with what I got. I know times are hard right now, but my pizza had no ranch or hot sauce drizzle, with only 1 listed on tag, toppings were all on one side and pizza not cut correctly, 4 small and 2 huge pieces.

name: Stephan Denning
text: Tasty individual pizzas that are affordable and reasonably priced. Outside eating area.

name: Ashlei M.
text: Love this place. You can get good pizza for cheap. They also have vegan options that they keep separate from the regular options to prevent contamination. Top 5 pizza places and it ain't number 5 lol.

name: LaRena Fry
text: How nice to have a wonderful pizza place in town that has Gluten-Free, Keto, Paleo, and vegan options. If you haven't been yet, it is a build your own pizza which offers a ton of options in vegetables and cheeses which includes a vegan ‚Ä¶More

name: Miesha Wright
text: Don't go here 5-7pm  Working for postmates had too wait over an hour for customers orders unsatisfied with this restaurant both customers cancelled their orders lost out on over $20 bucks thanks a lot Blaze Pizza

name: Team Simpson
text: Horrible lady in management at this establishment in Sparks.  Great Pizza, and seems to employ young workers out of high school ‚Äî horrible manager though ‚Äîa lady go figure

name: Ms. Dawn
text: So, I have had Blaze Pizza before and had to go back. The pizza is surprisingly affordable. Only $10 roughly for my, "build your own pizza" with choices of toppings. I didn't even mind the line was long, sometimes that means the food is ‚Ä¶More

name: Nik Riedel
text: Manager discriminates against ppl medically disabled!!!

name: Sabrina Silva
text: Love this place pizza is great and so is  the staff. Love the fresh flavored waters too. Great family spot and amazing pizza! This is my go too for pizza. Price is great for such an amazing  pizza.  Willing to pay more !

name: Terri Lee
text: It has been so long since my husband and myself have enjoyed pizza together. I am gluten free, but hate all those crusts that I see at other pizza places! Blaze offers several options that give me choices! Tonight I tried the Keto crust. ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Houston
text: It's good. Just not great! Don't have different sizes like some other chains. Dough isn't too special. Employees didn't seem to care too much about anything really. Sauce was good. Cheeses and toppings were good. Atmosphere was okay.

name: Greg Hart Jr
text: Very quick friendly staff. Line was almost out the door and still only took 5 mins or so to get through. Staff making your pizza is super friendly and personable. Pizza was fresh and very tasty. Great job Blaze team I will be back again!

name: Garry Khangura
text: Ordered the pizza after trusting the reviews. Fast service, got pizza in 5 mins and the quality was 5 stars

name: David Gonzalez
text:
I love this place my favorite.

I ordered over the phone because  Their website never works. After placing the ‚Ä¶More

name: R. L.
text: Love, Love, LOVE THIS PLACE!  The food is fresh, cooked to order & it tastes fantastic!  I go there once or twice a week for lunch!  The price for the pizza is great too!  You can get a "simple pie" (which is a cheese pizza) for only $5.45.  You cannot beat this for price & quality!!

name: Diasquez Family
text: I would have given it 5 start but sadly they messed up 1 of my 4 pizzas and they added blue cheese after i had told them i didn't want any. Blue cheese completely ruined the pizza and now im sitting here debating if i want to go waist more ‚Ä¶More

name: Diana Hall
text: The pizza is always good but then I make it myself exactly how I want so how could it be bad this location has excellent customer service and the staff is very friendly and accommodating I would definitely give it five stars and I'm sure I'll return

name: Scott Wittig
text: My favorite pizza in town!

name: Rachel Fenton
text: My husband was sent by his work to order 30 pizzas for the entire staff. It‚Äôs a large lead recycling plant. He called ahead to place the order. The person answering the phone said ‚Äúthis is a prank. No one orders 30 pizzas.‚Äù He said, no, ‚Ä¶More

name: melissa b
text: good service, good place for a personal Pizza. great location too!

name: Roger Nevada
text: So we thought we would give blade pizza a try. We ordered the 2-Top pizza with a side salad. When we saw how nasty and wilted the lettuce was we told them to cancel the salad. We decided to go ahead and get the pizza. The food prep area was ‚Ä¶More

name: Raylene Shultz
text: Zac the day shift manager is so friendly and welcoming and supports his team. I got the art lover with some additional toppings and it was so delicious. Sam was also very helpful and patient with rose on teaching her the oven. Great energy coming here for lunch!

name: ryan hagglund
text: Zach and Brandon the managers at blaze is sparks have been the best. I have always been greeted and feel appreciated every time I eat there. The food is amazing the employees seem to take to the management very well and I feel a positive vibe everytime I come in

name: Bion Towne
text: Went here for the first time and it is a little different. The process placing your order was like ordering at a sandwich shop. You stand in line, place your order, and buy the time you're at the end your pizza is done. ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Moore
text: Super fresh ingredients, great prices, custom pizza for under 10 bucks. Cant go wrong.

name: Michele Welch
text: The place was filthy from the front doors  to the floor!  Person making our pizza had a loose ponytail with hair hanging around her face and over food. Drink area grimy looking. Bathroom was gross. Floor behind counter was 2 inches thick ‚Ä¶More

name: ZAN ALEXANDER
text: Stopped by this pizza shop on my cross country drive to California. Absolutely amazing experience. Easy on/off from the highway. I customized my own pizza- pesto base with veggies and chicken. Fast, hot, and clean. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a healthy quick bite.

name: Amy Auerbach
text: by far Blaze Pizza is the best in town. friendly. quick. and soooo yummy pizza. they have gluten free and made to order options. perfectly located at the right side of Habit and Jersey Mikes. Be sure to download their app for fabulous rewards. We ordered the meat trio. perfect every time.

name: Verdugo
text: Definitely a nice place. I got my pizza just 5 minutes after paying for it, and it tasted so good. It reminded me of how Sbarro used to taste before they changed their pizzas. The sauce is amazing and I really loved the meatballs. $8 for a medium pizza. It's worth going in and giving it a shot. This is my new favorite pizza place.

name: Mercedes Porsche
text: Great pizza. This is kind of like a place called & Pizza but better. They custom make pizza to order in front of you.

name: Faraz Saeed
text: Probably the best pizza I've had in all of Reno. Loved the environment, came in with some of my friends and all the employees were super friendly. Restaurant was clean and well kept. The line was fairly long when we arrived but it moved ‚Ä¶More

name: Frektane Kaliska
text: Incredible! Great value, very nice staff, 8 KINDS OF CHEESE? the perfect pizza, not too thin crust, crispy and any topping for the same price! Delicious.

name: Sarah Wilson
text: Pizza is awesome! Pick your own is there best, or is as good as the toppings you choose! Delicious!

name: Jessica Carbine
text: I love love love Blaze Pizza! You choose your toppings and they make it in front of you, to your specifications. (Want LOTS of sausage, just tell them!) And you don't have to pay for each additional topping! Delicious.

name: Dooley Alec
text: Free drink for 5 minute wait, very fair price, AWSOME customer service and hot delicious pizza!! 5 stars all day

name: Dorine
text: BBQ chicken with cauliflower crust, garlic knots with blood orange fresca drink.  Pizza was yum, garlic knots yum and drink refreshing.  Friendly staff, clean restaurant.  People that bring their young kids and allow them to crawl on a booth as if it were playtime.... wow unreal.

name: Andrea Hernandez
text: I like the convenience and ability to pick your own toppings all while getting pizza made fairly quickly ....delicious for those reasons

text: Great atmosphere, employees were very friendly and patient, made sure to ask how my pizza looked as they added toppings. Place was clean, I was impressed to watch a blonde girl pour the drinks and not spill a drop while I was in there. Definitely will be returning to this location and suggesting it to friends.
